sources.title: Woman of Straw (1964)
sources.description: Anthony Richmond schemes to get the fortune of his tyrannical, wheelchair-using tycoon uncle Charles Richmond by persuading Maria, a nurse he employs, to marry him. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/woman-of-straw-1964/

sources.title: Woman Of Straw (1964) Gina Lollobrigida · Sean Connery
sources.description: A paralyzed industrialist's nurse marries the patient and, after his sudden death, becomes a suspect in the murder. A slow-moving, yet later thrilling story of a nearly perfect crime..

metadata.Plot: A ruthless tycoon, whom his nephew (Anthony "Tony" Richmond) hates as he had both deprived his father of half of the family business and had (after his father had committed suicide) married his mother. A nurse (Maria) from a poor Italian family, is initially hired to care for the tycoon. She initially dislikes him because he abuses his employees. Tony convinces Maria to persist in his employ, however, telling her that he plans to bequeath his entire (fifty million pound) fortune to charity. He plans to help her marry him, then to help him change his will, and (perhaps) then to help her achieve her inheritance, all for a payoff of one million pounds.
